content: When you get to the Pagoda Realm, you'll climb the pagoda to reach the top. Opposite the Upper Pagoda Shrine, you can drop down into a pit to find Captain Lotus-Vision. Beating the Captain is essential if you want to unlock those purple seals.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 3', specifically from the subsection 'Captain Lotus-Vision'.
The content is as follows:
When you get to the Pagoda Realm, you'll climb the pagoda to reach the top. Opposite the Upper Pagoda Shrine, you can drop down into a pit to find Captain Lotus-Vision. Beating the Captain is essential if you want to unlock those purple seals.
